title: Breakfast bar*, Pet-friendly, Large spa on pool deck
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 480-600 Sq.
Located in the historic Temescal neighborhood of Oakland across from the MacArthur BART station, it’s close to the Bay’s major work centers and has plenty to do just down the street.
It’s a place where you can do as much, or as little, as you want and get anywhere you need to be — fast.

Wood-inspired plank flooring, Private balconies with glass railings*, Large picture windows with views*, Pet-friendly, Subway tile backsplashes, Upgraded stainless steel appliance package by Samsung, Full-size, in-unit, stackable washer/dryer, Energy efficient appliances and heating, Spacious walk-in closets, Quartz countertops, Breakfast bar*, Dual pane tilt windows, Fiber internet, Gourmet kitchen, Charging outlets with USB ports

Reserved parking with keyless entry, Custom bike workshop with maintenance station + abundant storage, Package service with mobile alerts, HDTV living room surrounded by entertainment solutions, Immediate access to AC Transit and BART, Terrace with grilling pavilion and views of Oakland and Berkeley Hills, Professional pet grooming station, Coffee lounge with Wi-Fi, State of the art fitness center with cardio + free weights, Pool-side, resort-style seating and private barbecue area, Large spa on pool deck, Virtual Fitness + Yoga studio, Onsite car-sharing service, Outdoor dog run, Fire-side lounge, Skydeck with views of the SF skyline, Expansive swimming pool
Pet friendly, contact us for details.
